topDeals.name: 1,500 live ladybugs
fectures: Who says you can't buy anything for under $10 anymore? In fact
Amazon shoppers can buy 1,500 crawling, flying somethings for the bargain price of a latte.

topDeals.name: A cat butt tissue holder
fectures: This seems like the nicest thing to be plucked from a cat's rear since, well, ever. And who doesn't like to be stared down with peering
Inquisitive eyes each time they need to blow their nose?

topDeals.name: A desktop refrigerator
fectures: Now when you say you need a cold one, you can mean it literally
With one (1) single refrigerated beverage at your fingertips
